name: ICO
0:
”Alexa, open ico”
”Alexa, ask ico the temperature of my pool”
”Alexa, ask ico if I have pending recommendations”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ico
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Always connected, ICO monitors the quality of your pool water 24/7. ICO measures, analyses, anticipates, and sends you recommendations for easy maintenance, clean and healthy water. Check measurements and tips right on your smartphone, wherever you are. Thanks to the SHARE function, serenely entrust your pool to your relatives during your absences.

With ICO skill, simply ask Alexa to know the temperature of your water or if you have pending recommendations.

ICO skill is designed for ICO pool / spa owners. To know more, visit ondilo.com
